mapper.select: select (select t2.company_name from em_company t2 where substr(t.company_id,0,2)=t2.company_id) company, (select t2.company_name from em_company t2 where t.company_id=t2.company_id) shiyebu,t.* from em_day_report t where t.company_Id in and t.year=${year} and t.month=${month} order by t.company_id,t.meter_no,t.yearmonth

select t.meter_no,t.project_no,t.e_value,t.company_id,t.day,t.fee, (select t2.name from t_permission t2 where t2.company_id=t.company_id) company from em_day_report t where company_Id in ${companyIds} and t.year=${year} and t.month=${month} order by t.company_id,t.meter_no,t.yearmonth
select distinct t.carrier_name from em_day_carrier_report t where t.company_Id in and t.year=${year} and t.month=${month} order by t.carrier_name desc

select (select t2.company_name from em_company t2 where substr(t.company_id,0,2)=t2.company_id) company, (select t2.company_name from em_company t2 where t.company_id=t2.company_id) shiyebu,t.* from em_day_carrier_report t where t.company_Id in and t.year=${year} and t.month=${month} and t.carrier_name=#{carrierName} order by t.company_id,t.meter_no,t.yearmonth
